name: environment-safe-template
description: A template for buildless module development
author: Abbey Hawk Sparrow <@khrome> (http://patternweaver.com)

scripts.container-test: docker build . -t environment-safe-package.json -f ./containers/test.dockerfile; docker logs --follow "$(docker run -d environment-safe-package.json)"
scripts.generate-docs: for i in src/*.mjs; do echo "generating docs for: ${i}";./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc2md -c .jsdoc.json "${i}" > "docs/$(basename ${i%.mjs}).md"; done
scripts.generate-types: for i in src/*.mjs; do echo "generating types for: ${i}"; ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc -t node_modules/tsd-jsdoc/dist -c .jsdoc.json "${i}"; mv out/types.d.ts "src/$(basename ${i%.mjs}).d.ts"; done; rmdir out
scripts.add-generated-files-to-commit: git add docs/*.md; git add src/*.d.ts; git add dist/*.cjs
